english: (Kostas) Don't come, the girl will die.
In the name of our Sultan Alaeddin Keykubad...
I'll say it one last time.
You're of Seljuk descent. You are the

text: Lakin mahremime kimden izin aldın da geldin?
english: But whose permission did you get to enter my private space ? Come on then

text: Aytolun Hatun'la konuşacaktım beyim, ondan geldim.
english: I was going to speak with Aytolun Hatun, sir, that's why I came. Sir
arrived at the camp with his soldiers .

text: Halime Sultan, siz biraz istirahat buyurun.
english: Halime Sultan, please rest a little.

text: Aytolun Hatun az sonra sizi görmeye gelecek.
english: Aytolun Hatun will be coming to see you shortly.
Take care of Halime Sultan. Leave my
Halime Sultan. I have respect for you. Don't
Victory awaits. You have Tangut, your soldier who

text: Sizi zafere götürecek nökeriniz Tangut var.
english: will lead you to victory . Is

text: Sözüme karşı çıkacak olan var mı?
english: there anyone who will contradict me? If there is a
man out there, let him come out and face me.
My sister. Get up, sister. Are you ok?

text: Noyan'ı öldür ve onun yerine komutan ol. Bu kadar basit.
english: Kill Noyan and become commander in his place. It's that simple.

text: Ögeday niye onun yerine beni komutan yapsın ki?
english: Why would Ögeday appoint me as commander instead of him?
Because I have what Ögeday wants. If
From what I can see, our gentlemen…
…or the ravens feast on the carcass.

text: Allah senden de, oğlundan da razı olsun.
english: God be pleased with you and your son . -You've

text: Yine geleceksiniz değil mi Ertuğrul Bey’im?
english: You will come again, won't you, Mr. Ertuğrul? I

text: İnşallah en yakın zamanda geleceğim Edebali.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Eyvallah. Yolun açık olsun.
english: (All together) Thank you. Have a safe journey.
Huh, Sungur? What did we do? We ourselves set free the infidels who coveted our

text: Ekmeğimize, bacımıza, anamıza göz diken kefereyi…
english: bread, our sisters, and our mothers
I'm going to kill Noyan, brother. If I kill

text: …sulh zaafa düşer. Esir komutanlarımız da Moğolların elinde ölür.
english: …peace will be weakened. Our captured commanders also die at the hands of the Mongols.

text: O yüzden Köpek, esir komutanlarımızı alıp getirdikten sonra...
english: Therefore, after Dog brings back our captured commanders ...
n't allow that, brother. I can't send

text: Seni Noyan’ın peşine tek başına salamam.
english: you alone after Noyan . I have to

text: Noyan yaşarsa, neler olacağını sen de çok iyi bilirsin.
english: Noyan lives, you know very well what will happen. Then

text: O vakit ben de seninle geleceğim kardeşim.
english: I will come with you, brother.

text: Bu öyle bir yoldur ki ağabey…
…ne vakit dönerim, döner miyim, dönmez miyim belli değildir.
english: ...where it's uncertain when I'll return, or if I'll return at all.

text: Sen iki obanın da Alplerinin başısın. Yokluğunda oba zaafa düşer.
english: You are the leader of the Alps of both tribes. The tribe is weakened in his absence.
Son, the village is now entrusted to you.
the sun our flag, and the sky our tent .
We will drive our horses across the vast plains.

text: Pusatlarımızı yâr eyleyip, ordularımızı gür kılacağız.
english: We will make our weapons our allies, and our armies mighty.

text: Tamgamız, yedi iklimde adaletin sancağı olarak dalgalanacak.
english: Our emblem will wave as a banner of justice across the seven climates.

text: İlahi muştumuzu dağların, denizlerin ötesine taşıyacağız.
english: We will carry our divine message beyond mountains and seas.
You experienced defeat, not victory, Noyan.
I wanted to remind you of this. If
…my head would have been chopped off long ago, Dog.
(Noyan) This is a demon from hell.
Welcome to the world of the Mongols.
I will make you all vomit death.
Ah, defeat that fuels anger. Don't ever cross paths with

text: Beyim, Noyan’ın gitmesine izin vermeyeceğini bilmeliydim.
english: My lord, I should have known you wouldn't let Noyan go.

text: Ben de senin rahat duymayacağını biliyor olmalıydım Deli Demir.
english: I should have known you wouldn't be comfortable, Crazy Demir.
The tracks lead to the caravanserai.
They took Noyan there. Rest assured.

text: İçin rahat olsun. O soysuzu öldüreceğim.
english: I'm going to kill that bastard.

text: Şimdi sen obaya dönesin. Obaya dön, nice yiğitlerimize…
english: Now you shall return to the camp. Return to the camp, and forge many more Zulfiqar swords for our many brave warriors…
…and many more Zulfiqar swords. Don't leave the village without you.

text: Beyim, müsaaden olursa ben de gelmek isterim.
english: Sir, if you allow me, I would like to come as well.

text: Dönüşü olmayan bir yoldur bu, Deli Demir.
english: This is a point of no return, Crazy Demir.
Sir… could there be a better way to

text: …bundan daha iyi bir yol olur mu?

english: What's up, Turgut brother? You writhe
as if trapped in a web of fate .

text: Biz doğuştan kaderin yükünü sırtlamışız beyim.
english: We have been born bearing the burden of fate, sir. Has it ever stopped bothering us

text: Anlat derdini de yükünü omuzlayalım o vakit.
english: Tell us your troubles so we can shoulder your burden.
This road has come to an end, sir.
Where is our next destination? What have we gained

text: Yol seni yormuş gibi Turgut kardeş.
english: The journey seems to have tired you out, Turgut brother.
Let's take a breather in the camp. It's
not the road, sir... it's not knowing what's going through
your mind that tires me. I would give my life for you, my lord

text: Biz seninle ölümüne bir yola baş koyduk.
english: We have embarked on a path to the death together .
who told us that we should embark on this path? What does it matter

text: Bana bunu kimin söylediğinin ne ehemmiyeti var Turgut kardeş?
english: who told me this, Turgut brother?

text: Ne vakittir söylediklerim sual edilir oldu?
english: Since when have my words been questioned? Not at all,

text: Sadece gönlünde, zihninde eski yerim yoktur diye kederlenirim.
english: I only grieve because I no longer have my old place in your heart and mind.

text: Gayrı bana hiçbir sırrını söylemezsin beyim.
english: From now on, you will not tell me any of your secrets, my lord .

text: Her şeyin bir vakti var Turgut kardeş.
english: Everything has its time, Turgut brother. Just a

text: Şu aşımızı yiyelim. Ondan sonra Ahlat’a yola koyulacağım.
english: Let's get our vaccine. After that, I will set off for Ahlat. Please
We will wait for you a lifetime, sir.
The meal is prepared to your liking, sir.
-Peace be upon you. -And peace be upon you, sir. You're much better now,

text: Başımdan bir an bile ayrılmadınız. İyi ettiniz beni.
english: You never left my side for a single moment. You did me a favor.
The Alps miss you very much, too.

text: Tez zamanda talimhanede görmek isterler seni.
english: They want to see you at the training ground soon.

text: Allah’ın izniyle onu da yapacağım beyim.
english: I will do that too, God willing, sir.
Why are you so troubled, sir?

text: Sungur’u Noyan’ın peşinden tek başına göndermeyecektim.
english: I wasn't going to send Sungur alone after Noyan.

text: Beyim, sen beş yüz Alpini de gönderseydin…
english: Sir, do you think it would have been better if you had sent five hundred Alpines as well
You would have been a hindrance to Sungur Tekin.

text: Hem o cenge gitmedi ki. Bir soysuzun hesabını görmeye gitti.
english: But he didn't go to war. He went to settle the score with a scoundrel.
My brother didn't want me around.

text: Beyim, sen iki obanın da başalpisin.
english: My lord, you are the chieftain of both tribes .

text: Bu yol nice bir yoldur, nereye gider, nereye varır bilinmez.
english: This is a very long road; it's unknown where it leads or where it ends.
And in the end, this whole thing might even involve following

text: …Noyan’ın peşinden Çin’e kadar gitmek de var.
english: Noyan all the way to China .

text: Doğru dersin Artuk Bey. Doğru dersin de…
english: You're right, Mr. Artuk. You're right, but
... my mother is in a terrible state. Before she could even enjoy the joy of
being reunited with her child… the
pain of separation settled in her heart.
My lord, you were forced to obey the state's orders and

text: Sungur Tekin de ailesi için gereğini yaptı.
english: Sungur Tekin also did what was necessary for his family. The rest is up to
wear yourself out for nothing. Thank you, sir

text: Başka bir isteğin var mı ana?

english: Now both my arms are cut off.

text: İki gözüm, iki kulağım, iki ciğerim.
english: My two eyes, my two ears, my two lungs.

text: Ana, kurban olayım artık böyle perişan etme kendini.
english: Mother, please, for heaven's sake, don't torment yourself like this anymore.

text: Bak, hiç beklemezken obamıza sulh geldi.
english: Look, peace has come to our village when we least expected it .

text: Ertuğrul ile Sungur Tekin Bey’im de gelecek.
english: Ertuğrul and Sungur Tekin Bey will also be coming.

text: Obamıza huzur gelecek ana. Sen artık düşünme bunları.
english: Peace will come to our village, mother. Don't think about these things anymore.
How will peace come, my daughter?
Sometimes I lose hope. We share the same encampment with vipers so blinded by rage that they would

text: Otağıma girip evladımın emaneti, mührü çalacak kadar gözü dönmüş çıyanlarla…
english: break into my tent and steal my son's precious seal
Noyan left. But the betrayal didn't end.

text: Ana, hâlâ otağımıza girip çıkanlardan sorgulamadıkların var.
english: Mother, there are still some people who come and go from our tent that you haven't questioned.

text: Ucu nereye giderse gitsin, peşini bırakmayacağım dediydin.
english: You said you wouldn't give up, no matter where it led.
Who do you think is my daughter? "You said you would question

text: Kızlarım gibi gelinlerimi de sorgulayacağım demiştin ana.
english: your daughters-in-law just like you question your daughters, Mother," you said.
I'd like to hear from him too. Yes,
(Sound of water) Are you the ones who aspire to become the

text: Cihanın güneşi Selçuklu’ya siz mi talipsiniz?
english: sun of the world, the Seljuk Empire ? With all
this savagery of yours? What about

text: Ya siz saray avratlığından ne zaman vazgeçersiniz, ha?
english: When will you give up your palace wife ways, huh?
You want to rule the world.

text: Ama ne usul bilirsiniz ne erkân.
english: But you know neither manners nor etiquette.
You? So what good did it do

text: Siz usul erkân bildiniz de ne oldu, ha?
english: you to know proper etiquette , huh?
Your lands, your holy cities, your magnificent temples…

text: Cesetleriniz çöldeki kum taneleri gibi savrulup gidecek.
english: Your bodies will be scattered like grains of sand in the desert . All that will remain
…is the eternal curse of mankind. Huh! Don't

text: Noyan, bir daha benim soframı tükürüğünle kirletirsen…
english: Noyan, if you ever again defile my table with your spit…
…unfortunately, the taste of this delicious meal of mine …
…will be spoiled by your filthy blood.

text: Hoş geldin Süleyman Şah oğlu Ertuğrul.
english: Welcome, Ertuğrul, son of Süleyman Şah.
I hope you had a pleasant trip.
I found everything I was looking for.
We won't hear about this, son.

text: Hoş geldin Süleyman Şah oğlu Ertuğrul.
english: Welcome, Ertuğrul, son of Süleyman Şah.

text: Kutlu yolculuğunu anlat hele. Anlat ki…
english: Tell us about your blessed journey. Tell me… so that I may have the good fortune to hear everything I’ve long

text: …senin gibi bir yiğidin ağzından işitmek nasip olsun.

english: What has Ertuğrul done to you?

text: Unutma, senin canın hâlâ benim elimde.
english: Remember, your life is still in my hands.
Now let's eat our meal properly. Ah! I will go to
Ögeday and explain the situation. Don't forget to tell

text: Ona seni ipten kurtardığımı söylemeyi unutma.
english: him I saved you from the noose . I will persuade

text: Onu büyük bir orduyla gelmeye ikna edeceğim.
english: him to come with a large army . What if they're

text: O zaman kendi ordumu kurar gelirim.
english: Then I will form my own army and come. Don't underestimate the

text: Ya döndüğünde daha büyük bir orduyla karşılaşırsan?
english: return to face an even larger army?
Sultan Alaeddin is growing stronger day by day.
You will help me too. When

text: Vakti geldiğinde senden ve Ögeday’dan bir ordu isterim.
english: the time comes, I will request an army from you and Ögeday .
(Sound of a spoon banging on a tray)
Well, you call yourself a ruler, huh?
If you become ruler, woe to us.
Don't lose your seriousness, Noyan. Don't
Ögeday's army will be on his side .
I'm going to go and get some good rest.

text: Sen gerekeni yap. Sonra beni haberdar edersin.
english: Do what needs to be done. Then you'll let me know.

text: Bizans hududu büyük bir buhran içinde kaynar.
english: Byzantine border is seething with great turmoil.

text: Gayrimüslim ahali, kendine zulüm eden idarecilerden kurtulmak ister.
english: Non-Muslims want to be freed from rulers who oppress them. It awaits a power that

text: Bereketli topraklarına nizam getirecek bir kudret bekler.
english: will bring order to its fertile lands . The

text: Ahali, kendi dindaşlarına olan inancını yitirmiş durumda.
english: The people have lost faith in their fellow believers .

text: Her yerde adaletten kaçan başıboş eşkıyalar cirit atar.
english: Everywhere you look, there are roaming bandits who have escaped justice. The

text: Oraları kendine mesken tutmuş göçer Türkmenler de…
english: nomadic Turkmen who have made those areas their home also
Because they cannot solve their own problems… they cannot alleviate the
suffering of the people oppressed by Byzantium .

text: …o diyarlara kim adalet ile hükmederse, kudret bulur.
english: whoever rules those lands with justice will gain power.

text: Buhranlı günler, yiğidin pusatına güç verir.
english: Troubled times strengthen a brave man's resolve.
The opportunities are right there in the open .
But nobody turns around to look.
Whoever looks upon it will prosper.

text: Lakin obamı oralara taşımak epey meşakkatli olacaktır.
english: However, moving my tribe there will be quite a difficult task.
If I move my tribe there…

text: …göçer Türkmenlerin, şehirli ahalinin ve Bizans’ın en büyük düşmanı olurum.
english: …I will become the greatest enemy of the nomadic Turkmen, the city dwellers, and Byzantium.

text: Doğrudur. Rızık az, boğaz çok olunca…
english: That's true. When sustenance is scarce and mouths to feed are abundant…

text: Evlat, mesele sadece Kayı’nın meselesi değildir.
english: Son, this is n't just a matter for Kayı.

text: Anadolu ve Âlem-i İslam gerçek düşmanını görmek yerine…
english: Instead of recognizing their true enemy, Anatolia and the Islamic world…

text: Bizans bir yanda, Moğol diğer yanda.
english: Byzantium on one side, Mongols on the other.
We too will fall into discord.
And we will be nothing, forever.
What will happen to me? Isn't

text: Hiçlerin yoldaşı olmak yetmez mi sana?
english: being a companion to nothingness enough for you?

text: Belki obanı oraya götürmek senelerini alacak.
english: Perhaps it will take years to move the tribe there.

text: Tek düşmanın Bizans olunca dostun da çok olacak.
english: When your only enemy is Byzantium, you'll have many friends. Do
n't worry about the traitors either.
They will experience the real torment in hell.
Now, it is not up to us to give up… but to

text: İnşallah obamı Bizans hududuna taşımak için…

english: I will do everything in my power to move my tribe to the Byzantine border…

text: Hâlâ kendini komutan görür değil mi?
english: still sees himself as the commander, does n't he?
Well, he's still the commander. To

text: Şimdi beni iyi dinle. Sana sadece Noyan’ı teslim etmeyeceğim.
english: Now listen to me carefully. I won't just hand Noyan over to you.

text: Sana Oğuz Kağan’ın mührünü de vereceğim.
english: also give you the seal of Oğuz Kağan .

text: Al bunu, götür Ögeday’a kendin ver…
english: Take this, give it to Ögeday yourself...
I will never forget this kindness.

text: Lakin her iyiliğin bir bedeli vardır.
english: But every good deed comes at a price.

text: Bunun bedeli de Ögeday’a yeni sultanın Saadettin Köpek olacağını söylemen…
english: The price for this is that you tell Ögeday that the new sultan will be Saadettin Köpek…
Okay, Saadettin Köpek. It is possible.
Thanks to you, I 've gained immense power.
I will never forget this kindness.
I will fight to the death for you to become sultan in these lands.
(Sound of a staff striking the ground)

text: Şimdi Süleyman Şah oğlu Ertuğrul, çıktığın bu gaza yolunda…
english: Now, Ertuğrul, son of Süleyman Şah, on this path of holy war you have embarked upon…
…it is time to renew your oath.
This is your weapon. You should
weigh your weapon on the scales of justice and sharpen it
with the breath of wisdom. May

text: Pusatın mazluma umut ola, zalime korku sala.
english: your weapon be a source of hope for the oppressed and a source of fear for the oppressor.

text: Sancağının gölgesinde yetmiş iki millet huzur bula.
english: seventy-two nations find peace under the shadow of its banner. May
it wave in the skies until the end of time.
(Music continues) In the name of Allah, the
(Music - Sufi) In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the
This is the glorious Quran. It is the one

text: Hakikati açıklayan, karanlığı aydınlatan, adaleti sağlayandır.
english: who reveals the truth, illuminates the darkness, and ensures justice. May it
who creates with a single command…
…I swear by the weapon and the book…
…I will make the sun my banner and the sky my tent…
…and fight until I perish. I will
bring justice and strike fear into the heart of the oppressor. If
I ever turn back from the path of holy war I have set out on…
…or if I ever beg for mercy from the enemy…
…may my weapon enter the sky and emerge red. May
God be your helper and supporter on this blessed journey,

text: …yâr ve yardımcın olsun Süleyman Şah oğlu Ertuğrul.
english: Ertuğrul, son of Süleyman Şah. May
the journey be yours, and the victory be God's.
These must be the people who came to get Noyan .
These three brave men... ...must be the Seljuk commanders that

text: …Emir Saadettin Köpek’in bahsettiği Selçuklu komutanları olması lazım.
İyi de niye burada beklerler ki?
english: why would they wait here? Since

text: İki taraf da tedbirli davrandığına göre…
Belli ki işin içinde ince hesaplar var.
english: it's clear there are some calculated moves involved.
What are we going to do, sir?

text: Börü, esirleri hazırla. Noyan’ı getirmeye gidiyorum.
english: Wolf, prepare the captives. I'm going to pick up Noyan.
Good fortune will come to us, Crazy Demir.

text: (Hayme dış ses) Nasıl izin verdin gitmesine?
english: (Hayme's voiceover) How could you let him go?
How are they going to kill Noyan after chasing after the huge Mongol army?

text: (Gündoğdu dış ses) Gitmesi için elinden geleni yaptı.
english: (Gündoğdu's voiceover) He did everything he could to make her leave. Oh
God, what have I done? May I have your
Come, Goncagül Hatun. Be my guest

text: Noyan'ın gidişi seni çok üzdü bilirim.
english: I know Noyan's departure has upset you greatly.
I wanted to come and ask how he was doing.
...it will bring a smile to your face, at least a little," I said. Thank you.
...is the arrow my father shot into the sky so that the real tent might be pitched, sir

text: O gece bu okun düştüğü yerde kurulan çadırda...
english: That night, in the tent that was set up where this arrow landed...
...I was conceived in my mother's womb.
Ah. I thought I'd bring it to you
so it would bring good luck to us too

text: O vakit buna bir yer bulalım.
english: Let's find a place for it then.
I was going to say dinner is ready, sir.
things to talk to you about.
(Music) Just because peace has been made
peace will come to our village.
One calamity multiplied into a thousand. From

text: Bundan gayrı ne Hayme Ana'nın otağında...
english: now on, I don't want any trouble, neither in Hayme Ana's tent...
nor in the tents of my wives
's not deal with you either. Do
I hope Selcan Hatun will be like an

text: ...Gökçe Hatun'a ettiği gibi bana da ablalık eder, yol gösterir.
english: older sister to me, guiding me as she was to Gökçe Hatun.
As long as our hearts are pure.

text: Üç gün içinde Selçuklu topraklarını terk etmezseniz...
english: If you do not leave Seljuk lands within three days...
...you will be considered to have broken the peace...

text: Döndüğümde bir karış bile Selçuklu toprağı bırakmayacağım.
english: When I return, I will not leave a single inch of Seljuk land behind.
...I sincerely wish you would be like an older sister to me , you should know that. Have no
doubt about it, Goncagül Hatun. Being an
older sister isn't a problem. All I want is

text: Yeter ki göğsünün içinde bir gönül bulayım.
english: to find a heart within your chest.
My mother wants to see you.
I don't know, Goncagül Hatun. You'll find out when you get there.

text: Yarım kalan işini bitirmek ister belki.
english: Perhaps he wants to finish what he started.
stolen item from the tent. He
also wanted to listen to you.

text: İnat etmeye devam edecek mi göreceğiz.
english: We'll see if he continues to be stubborn.
You asked for me, Hayme Ana, please come in.
The night Sungur Tekin was there...
Why did you go into the place where my son is staying?

text: Bana bunu niye sorarsınız Hayme Ana?
english: Why do you ask me this, Hayme Ana?

text: Bunu en iyi Gökçe Hatun bilir. Ona sorun isterseniz.
english: Gökçe Hatun knows this best. Ask him if you want.

text: Sizi çok iyi anlarım Hayme Ana.
english: I understand you very well, Mother Hayme.

text: Kayının şerefli otağına bir hainin eli uzanmıştır.
english: A traitor's hand has reached into the honorable tent of Kayı. It

text: Bulup bu eli kesmek sizin vazifenizdir.
english: is your duty to find this hand and cut it off.

text: Sana bir soru sordum, cevabını ver.
english: I asked you a question, answer it. You are very angry because you experienced

text: Otağınızda böyle bir zafiyet yaşadığınız için...
english: such a weakness in your tent
...I went there because Gökçe Hatun wanted me to.
Not of my own free will.

text: Gökçe kumaş almak için dışarı çıkmış.
english: Gökçe went out to buy fabric.
You were left alone inside. What have you done?

text: ...genç bir kızın en büyük hayalini kurdum ana.
english: ...I dreamt the biggest dream a young girl has, Mom.
Looking at the fabrics Gökçe Hatun showed me...

text: ...erimin nikâhına girmeden evvel giyeceğim elbisenin hayalini kurdum.
english: ... I dreamed of the dress I would wear before my husband's wedding.

text: Senin oğluna ömrümü vereceğim gece giyeceğim elbisenin.
english: I will give my life for your son, the dress I will wear that night.
...whoever abducted Selcan Hatun from this tribe...
...will take whatever he desires from your tent.
...the one who stole that seal from my tent will be revealed.
Just like they found and brought Selcan here.
I will hang that traitor... ...in the middle of the village.

text: Ve inan ki onu kimse kurtaramayacak!

This winter has been wonderfully bountiful.

n't worry at all, my dear. Have a
I'm going to pay a visit.

trying to push the knife to the bone.

Emir Saadettin Köpek is the supporter.
As long as there are fools like Sungur...
...you won't need to use these gold reserves at all .

text: Hayme'nin otağında kimsenin ağzını bıçak açmaz.

What happened, is everything alright, my daughter?
He summoned me to his tent and interrogated me.
He is still pursuing the case of the missing seal.

text: ...belli ki bu işin içinde Selcan var.
english: ...it's clear that Selcan is involved in this.

text: Kadın kendi gelinini sorguya çekecek kadar haddini aşmıştır.

This job isn't going to be easy, brother.
...unless we tear down the Kayi tribe's encampment ...
...we won't have peace in this camp.

text: Bilesin ki Gündoğdu uç beyliğim için bu altınlardan daha kıymetlidir.

all very sad, Noyan. It pains them to see

instead of victory to his children

...will be a holiday for all the soldiers.
The jackals will devour each other, my lord.

of you will get hurt. That's

blood of my daughter... be spilled in vain. Tell
I bear witness that there is no god but Allah

I managed to bring him back.

handed over Noyan to the Mongols.

text: ...bizden intikam alacağını bile bile nasıl bıraktınız onu?

How did she let you leave him? It was he who persuaded

now going to defy the decree of our state ?

text: Kan akar, sulh yolunu bulur abi.

text: Hasta ruhlu o soysuzun elinden gelecek sulhun...

text: ...ne obamıza, ne de devletimize bir faydası olurdu zaten.

text: Bakalım yaptığınız bu hatanın bedeli ne olacak.

Crazy Demir is also with him.

english: Otherwise, Tangut, trembling like a little puppy in front of me...

text: Eğer Saadettin Köpek onun önüne kemik atmasaydı...
english: If Saadettin Köpek hadn't thrown a bone in front of him...

Send his corpse to Saadettin Köpek.
Let him meet his own end. We must set off

You need to rest. We have
no time to lose. I must prepare

will continue to get in our way and cause us trouble.

earth that the weapon cuts will disappear.
you're going to be a frontier lord of the Seljuk Empire...

The state's seal is in safe hands. Take
its carcass and carry it to the forest. May

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Toprağı yurt yapan mezardır.

text: Bu toprakları yurt kılmak için ömrünü verdin.

, you lost your wife, your two sons... and
your daughter as martyrs in battle.
Now you too have become a martyr...
Know this... ...I will not stop until my last breath
in order to make these lands our homeland

text: Senin naaşın önünde ant olsun ki...

text: ...bu kutlu davada ölene kadar seninleyim beyim.

I have waited my whole life for a hero like you. May
God be our helper and supporter.
In the hands of a brave man like you…
…may it be the voice of injustice…
…may it be its wrath, God willing.

I hope this is the last time, Mom.
upon you, brothers and sisters. Our deepest
pass away one by one, my lord.

...I am Deli Demir from the Kayı tribe.

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Nice vakittir ateşi harladım, demiri erittim...
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) For a long time I have stoked the fire, melted the iron...

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Ataya oğul, oğula ata oldum.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Allahu ekber. Allahu ekber. Allahu ekber.

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Sonu ölümlü dünya.
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) This world is ultimately mortal.

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Gayrı göç edenlerin kervanına ben de katılıyorum.
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) I too am joining the caravan of those who are migrating.

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Lakin gözüm arkada kalmadan gidiyorum.
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) But I'm leaving without any worries.

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Vakti gelince güller açar...
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) When the time comes, roses bloom...

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Gönlüne fetih ateşini düşüren Rabbim...
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) My Lord, who ignited the fire of conquest in your heart...

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Bin atlı akınlarla kıtalardan kıtalara koşacaksın.
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) You will gallop from continent to continent with a thousand horsemen.

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Nallarından sıçrayan kıvılcımlar...
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) The sparks flying from his hooves...
...will fall like embers into the heart of the tyrant.

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Fetihlerin rüzgârlara karışacak.
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) Your conquests will be carried away by the winds.

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Ata mirası sancağımız ufukları kaplayacak.
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) Our ancestral flag will cover the horizons.

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Bilirim ki bir garip Deli Demir gelecek.
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) I know a strange Deli Demir is coming.

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Senin büyük destanlarını anlatacak...
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) He will tell your great epics...

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Dilden dile yayılan destanların...
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) Legends that spread from mouth to mouth...

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Sancağının altında kurt kuzuya ilişemez olacak.
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) Under his banner, no wolf will dare harm a lamb.

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Bu yol çetin. Bu yol cefa dolu.
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) This road is tough. This path is full of hardship.
(Deli Demir's voiceover) The load is heavy.

text: (Deli Demir dış ses) Allah yar ve yardımcın olsun Ertuğrul Bey'im.
english: (Deli Demir's voiceover) May God be with you and help you, Ertuğrul Bey.
My brother Ertuğrul and I would like to talk to you. First of all, my condolences,
I heard you're close friends with the blacksmith. I wanted to attend the funeral of

text: Bu şerefli ve yiğit kardeşimizin cenazesine katılmak istedim.
english: this honorable and valiant brother . My
Our Sultan's pride and joy. What
's happening is upsetting us, Emir Saadettin.

text: Sarayda hainler olmasaydı Sungur Tekin açığa çıkmaz...

...he would still be serving his country and continuing his duties . If you hadn't ridden

text: Noyan iti için atınızı dört nala sürmeseydiniz...
english: your horse at a gallop for that dog Noyan ...

text: ...infaz edilir, adi bir zayiat olarak kurda kuşa yem olurdu.
english: ...he would have been executed, a common casualty, food for wolves and birds. Rest

text: Müsterih olun. Saraydaki hainleri tek tek temizledik.

(Ertuğrul) Clearly, you haven't cleaned it thoroughly enough. The

text: Saraydaki hainlerin eli obama kadar uzanır Emir Saadettin.
english: traitors in the palace have their hands all the way to Obama, Emir Saadettin.
What kind of cleaning are you talking about?
Know this... I will find the
hand that held that rope and cut it off. No matter

text: Ucu sarayda nereye dayanıyor olursa olsun.
english: where in the palace it leads.

text: Eğer siz devletin emrine itaat etseydiniz...
english: If you had obeyed the state's orders ...

text: ...bu zavallı demirci de bugün yaşıyor olacaktı Ertuğrul Bey.
english: ...this poor blacksmith would be alive today, Ertuğrul Bey. Given everything we've done

text: Devletimiz için bunca senedir yapıp ettiklerimiz ortadayken...
english: for our country over the years ...
how can you say that, Emir Saadettin?

text: Devlete itaat; işine gelince itaat, gelmeyince isyan değildir.
english: Obedience to the state; It's not about obedience when it suits you and rebellion when it doesn't.
Even if it hurts, you will obey.

text: Edeceksiniz ki devlet de size itimat etsin.
english: You must do this so that the state will trust you.

text: Şimdi beni iyi dinleyin. Tangut'un yuları başından beri benim elimdeydi.
english: Now listen to me carefully. Tangut's reins were in my hands from the very beginning. Everything was going smoothly until
Ertuğrul got involved in the Karabek affair and...

text: ...bir çuval inciri berbat edene dek her şey yolunda gidiyordu.
Sonra da Sungur Tekin geldi, yularını sımsıkı tuttuğum atımı kesti.
english: Then Sungur Tekin arrived and slaughtered my horse, whose reins I was holding tightly.
What do you say, Emir Saadettin? If

text: Sen kahramanlık edip o ihtiyar demirciyle ortaya çıkmasaydın...
english: you hadn't shown your heroism and come forward with that old blacksmith...

text: ...ve senin bunca senedir üstlendiğin vazifeyi üstlenecekti.
english: ...and taken over the task you've been carrying out for all these years. I was going to make
Tangut the commander in Noyan's place .
I was going to bury him under it until he drowned.

text: Lakin sen ve o ihtiyar demirci her şeyi berbat ettiniz.
english: But you and that old blacksmith messed everything up.

text: Bu devlet sizin gibi keçi güderken kurulmadı beylerim.
english: This state wasn't founded while you were herding goats like you, gentlemen.

text: Elbette sizin gibi yiğitlerin desteği hep oldu.
english: Of course, we've always had the support of brave men like you.

text: Lakin devlet sizin tahayyülünüzün çok daha üstündedir.
english: But the state is far more powerful than you can imagine. Our standing tall
in these lands for hundreds of years...
...and in the world for thousands of years...
I told Sultan Alaeddin everything. He will

text: Yakında bir mektup yazıp, sözlerimi teyit edecektir size.
english: write you a letter soon to confirm my words.
I hope that two brave men like you...

text: ...devlete ve onun emirine itaat etmeyi öğrenir.
english: ...will learn to obey the state and its commands .
From now on, I will be keeping a close eye on you.

text: ...beni bir kez daha hayal kırıklığına uğratmazsınız.

english: Deli Demir's blood will not be spilled in vain.
Noyan will die sooner or later.
I will do whatever it takes to kill him. Rest

text: Emin olun bu işi görmek de size nasip olacak.
english: assured, you will also have the opportunity to see this happen .
Because you have the right. May God protect you.
What do you say, big brother?
(Sungur Tekin) I don't know, Ertuğrul. If we can't

text: Sultandan sonra gelen adama da güvenmeyeceksek biz kime güveneceğiz?
english: even trust the man who comes after the Sultan, who can we trust?
I will wait for the letter from the sultan. I do

text: Gayrı mühür emin ellerde olmalı Ertuğrul.
english: Now the seal must be in safe hands, Ertuğrul.

text: Bu mührü ak sakallılara vermeni isterim.
english: I want you to give this seal to the white-bearded elders.

text: Bundan gayrı obam nereye ben oraya.
english: From now on, wherever my tribe goes, I will go too.

text: ...sen rahman ve rahimsin. Merhamet edensin. Affedensin.
english: You are the Most Gracious and the Most Merciful. You are merciful. Forgive me.

text: Yarabbi biz nankörlük ettik. Zillete düştük.
english: Oh Lord, we have been ungrateful. We have been humiliated.
We have lost the dignity of being Muslim. We have not been able to adequately express our gratitude for
the blessings you have given us .

text: ...sen zalimlere karşı İslam Ümmetine mağarayı kale...
english: ... You have made the cave a fortress, the

text: ...örümcek ağını zırh ve bir güvercini mızrak eyledin.
english: spider's web a shield, and a dove a spear for the Islamic Ummah against the oppressors.

text: Yarabbi, bugün düştüğümüz bu kuyudan bizi çıkart.
english: Oh God, pull us out of this pit we've fallen into today. Help me

text: Medet eyle. Rahmet eyle ki izzetimize yeniden kavuşalım.
english: . Have mercy on us so that we may regain our dignity. Let us be worthy of

text: Müslüman olma kudretine, insan olma hürriyetine layık olalım.
english: the power to be Muslim and the freedom to be human.

text: Sen yiğitlerimize yardım eyle ki düşmana boyun eğmeyelim.
english: Help our brave men so that we may not surrender to the enemy. May God protect us from

text: Sen medet eyle ki zalime özgürlüğümüzü vermeyelim.
english: giving our freedom to the oppressor. May we

text: Gün geçmiyor ki obada yas tutmayalım.
english: day goes by without mourning in the village.

text: Bilirim ki her iki oba da zor günler yaşadı.
english: I know that both tribes have gone through difficult times. We lost
many of our sons, our brave men, as martyrs.
...Mad Demir be the last one, Hayme Hatun. May
peace and tranquility come to our villages.
Peace has been established between the two states.
But Noyan will not make peace.

text: Ecelimiz olmak için öyle ya da böyle dönecektir.
english: will return, one way or another, to be our doom.

text: Sen onu Noyan'ı Emir Saadettin'e teslim etmeden önce düşünecektin Sungur Tekin.
english: You should have thought about that before handing Noyan over to Emir Saadettin, Sungur Tekin. What happened, happened

text: Olan oldu. Gayrı bizim de önümüze bakmamız gereklidir.
english: . Now we need to look ahead.

text: Ecelimizden korksaydık, Erzurum dağlarını mesken tutup...
english: If we feared death, we would not have made the mountains of Erzurum our home and ...

text: ...devletimizin yanında Moğol'a karşı göğsümüzü siper etmezdik.

english: (Korkut) Peace has revived our hopes. We
all need to move on with our lives.

text: Ben derim ki siz de münasip görürseniz...
english: I would say, if you agree... ...I
would like to officiate the wedding of my son and Gökçe. You're absolutely right,

text: Onu şehit vermek gönlümüze kor düşürmüştür.
english: Losing him as a martyr has ignited a fire in our hearts.

text: Acımız büyüktür, lakin senin de dediğin gibi...
english: Our grief is immense, but as you said...
our children's weddings as soon as possible .

text: Karnın burnunda ne edersin böyle Halime Sultan?
english: What are you doing like this, Halime Sultan, with your belly sticking out?

text: (Halime) Üç parça bir şey vardı Ertuğrul Bey'im. Onları yıkadım.
english: (Halime) There were three things, Ertuğrul Bey. I washed them. Don't

text: Hem şehzade kızı gibi görme beni. Ben obanın kızıyım.
english: see me as a princess. I am a girl from the tribe.

text: ...daha yiğit, daha güçlü bir delikanlı olacağım diye çırpınır durur.
english: more valiant, more powerful young man yearns to grow in your womb . There's

text: İçimde kızılca bir kıyamet var Ertuğrul.
english: a raging storm raging inside me, Ertuğrul.

text: Bırakın, dünyayı fethedeceğim diye çırpınır durur.
english: Let him struggle and strive to conquer the world .
...then she'll strive to be as intelligent as her mother...

text: ...anam gibi yiğit bir kız olacağım diye çırpınır durur.
Seninle bu dağlarda at koşturduğunu görür gibiyim Ertuğrul.
english: you riding horses in these mountains, Ertuğrul.
From Erzurum to Ahlat, from Diyarbakir to Alaiye.

text: Bahar gelip dallar çiçek açar açmaz...
english: spring arrives and the branches blossom... we will set off,
...will ride his horse on the Byzantine border. Have you spoken to

text: Hayme Ana'mla Gündoğdu Bey'imle konuştun mu?
Ertuğrul, daha başımız yeni beladan kurtuldu.
english: Ertuğrul, we've only just gotten rid of one problem. It's like going

text: Sulha ermişken yeni bir derde gitmek demek bu.

english: What do they say about this?
But all I know is... ...that we'll set off on our journey as soon as
Wherever you go, we'll follow, Ertuğrul. Just so
you know, there are now three of us.

text: ...çizmem kadar büyük, engerek kadar zehirli dilini...
english: ...tongue, as big as my boot and as venomous as a viper...
I will poison the heart of that old woman, who will be her husband, with the same poison. I asked so

text: Lakin en ağırı da Korkut'un avradı olmanı istememdi.
english: But the hardest part was that I wanted you to be Korkut's wife. The old

text: O ihtiyarın kokusu er geç üzerimden gidecektir.
english: man's scent will eventually leave me .

text: ...senin uç beyliğin her daim Oğuz'a kutup olacaktır.
english: ...your border principality will always be a beacon for the Oghuz. While
Tuğtekin is caressing Gökçe in the bridal tent...

text: ...babası olacak o ihtiyar da son nefesini verecek.
english: ...that old man, who will be her father, will breathe his last. The

text: ...Korkut'un öldüğü, senin doğduğun gece olacak ağabey.
english: ...will be the night Korkut dies, the night you were born, brother.

text: Senin hakkını nasıl ödeyeceğim ben Aytolun?
english: How can I ever repay you, Aytolun?
have things to do in the yurt.

text: Aytolun denen o kaltağın otağında sakladığı şeyi bulmama yardım edersen...
english: If you help me find what that bitch Aytolun is hiding in her tent...

text: Yeter! Beyime de hanımıma da ihanet edemem.
english: That's enough! I cannot betray either my husband or my wife.

text: Senin bilip de demediğin ne var Banı Çiçek?
english: What is it that you know but haven't told me, Banı Çiçek?

text: Bu meselenin halli her şeyden evveldir. Korkut Bey'e karşı vazifendir bu senin.
english: Resolving this issue is the top priority. This is your duty towards Korkut Bey.
...where are you? I keep looking for
What are you doing here? I'm tidying up,
this the time to tidy up?
Finish the tasks I told you to do first. As you

text: Kayılar geldiğinden beri başımızdan bela eksik olmaz.
english: Ever since the Kayi tribe arrived, we've been plagued by trouble . Keep
your eyes wide open. And whatever you do, don't forget your
I was going to say my condolences.

text: Deli Demir sizler için babadan öteydi, bilirim.
english: I know Deli Demir was more than a father to you all.

text: Geçen sefer olanların hepsi mazide kaldı.
english: Everything that happened last time is in the past.

text: Hem ben de sana hoyratlık ettim.
english: I have been cruel to you too.

text: Haddim olmadan senin gibi bir yiğidin gırtlağına hançerimi dayadım.
english: Without having the right, I held my dagger to the throat of a brave man like you .
Banı Çiçek. Tell me about it

text: De bakalım hele bana; neden şüphe edersin Aytolun'dan?
english: ; Why do you doubt Aytolun? I

text: Lakin bilesin ki Aytolun denen o kancık...
english: But know this: that bitch Aytolun...

text: ...Korkut dayımın otağını uğursuz bir örümcek gibi ağlarıyla sarmıştır.
english: ...has surrounded my Uncle Korkut's tent with her webs like an ominous spider.

text: Şimdi de Hayme Ana'mın otağını sarar.
english: Now it surrounds Hayme Ana's tent.

text: Senin yüzünden Korkut Bey'imin otağına gizlice girdim.
english: Because of you, I secretly entered Korkut Bey's tent.
I called. Just like a thief.

text: Az kaldı yakalanıyordum. Şimdi sen bana söyleyeceksin.
english: I almost got caught. Now you'll tell me.
But you will tell the truth.

text: Yoksa vallahi de billahi de keserim gırtlağını Selcan Hatun.
english: Otherwise, I swear to God, I'll slit your throat, Selcan Hatun. Tell
my uncle Korkut's lover before my aunt Duru passed away.
I learned it from the old woman.

text: Dahasını da öğrenecektim, lakin kadının canını aldı.
english: I was going to learn more, but he took the woman's life.

text: Ama ben bilirim. Ben bilirim Banı Çiçek.
english: But I know. I know Banu Çiçek.
What do you know? What more do you know?
...killed my sister-in-law Duru... ...in order to become the lady of the tent
-(Ertuğrul) Oh my God! -(Deli Demir) God is the Truth!
-(Ertuğrul) Oh my God! -(Deli Demir) God is the Truth!
-(Ertuğrul) Oh my God! -(Deli Demir) God is the Truth!
-(Ertuğrul) Oh my God! -(Deli Demir) God is the Truth!
-(Ertuğrul) Oh my God! -(Deli Demir) God is the Truth!
-(Ertuğrul) Oh my God! -(Deli Demir) God is the Truth!
-(Ertuğrul) Oh my God! -(Deli Demir) God is the Truth!
I told you not to come. I said, "

text: Nice yiğitler senden nice zülfikarlar bekler dedim.
english: Many brave men await many swords like Zulfiqar from you." Even if the whole

text: İki cihan bir araya da gelse...
...Deli Demir, Noyan'ın bu obadan elini kolunu sallayarak gitmesine izin vermezdi.
english: ...Deli Demir wouldn't let Noyan leave this camp so easily. The blood of

text: Deli Demir'in de nice yiğidimizin de kanları yerde kalmayacak Ertuğrul.
english: Deli Demir and all our other brave warriors will not be spilled in vain, Ertuğrul.
we find the traitor in the camp...
...we can neither avenge the blood of our brave men ...
...nor settle the score with Noyan, brother.

text: Mühür Tangut'un eline nasıl geçti? Neden Noyan'a başkaldırdı?
english: How did the seal end up in Tangut's possession? Why did he rebel against Noyan?

text: Bütün bunların cevabı burada Ertuğrul. Bu obada.
english: The answer to all of this is right here, Ertuğrul. In this village.

text: Bunun cevabını Emir Saadettin zaten verdi ağabey.
english: Emir Saadettin already gave the answer to that, brother.
What do you want to say, brother?
I'd say, who wouldn't try to use Tangut... ...in that village?
...the necklace is very important to me.
... killed that poor woman to shut her up.
...threatens to use my necklace and tell everyone that

text: ...yaşlı kadını benim öldürdüğümü herkese söylemekle tehdit eder.
Bana inanman için daha ne diyeyim?
english: What more do I need to say to make you believe me?
...acted as a mother to both my sister and me.
became a second mother to us. Will

text: Duru yengemin de intikamını almak için...
-(Gündoğdu) Nasılsın Goncagül Hatun? -(Goncagül) İyiyim beyim. Sen?
english: -(Gündoğdu) How are you, Goncagül Hatun? -(Goncagül) I'm fine, sir. You?
What is Gökçe Hatun like? He's so excited
he doesn't know what to do.

text: Ee kolay değil. Bey hatunu olacak.
english: Well, it's not easy. She will be the husband's wife.

text: Tuğtekin gibi bir yiğitle aynı yastıkta kocamak kolay iş değildir.
english: together with a brave man like Tuğtekin is no easy task. You're

text: Doğru dersin beyim. Aynı heyecanı ben de gönlümde hissederim.
english: absolutely right, sir. I feel the same excitement in my heart as well.

text: (Gündoğdu) Tez vakitte bizim de nikâhımız kıyılacak, bilesin.
english: (Gündoğdu) Our wedding will take place very soon, just so you know.

text: İnşallah. O gün gelene kadar yüreğim bu heyecanı kaldırır beyim.
english: Hopefully. My heart can handle this excitement until that day comes, sir.
entered suddenly, sir. I couldn't stop it.
What do you want, Selcan Hatun?

text: Ne söyleyeceksen daha sonra söyle. Olmaz mı?
english: Say whatever you want to say later. Why not ? I know

text: Aytolun'la Duru yengem ölmeden ne haltlar karıştırdığınızı bilirim Korkut dayı.
english: what kind of mischief you and Aunt Duru were up to before they died, Uncle Korkut.
What do you say? Don't you dare try
to act tough in front of me.
Just listen to what I know.

text: Lakin hele diyeceklerimi duy, ondan sonra karar verirsin dellenip dellenmediğime.
english: But first, listen to what I have to say, then you can decide whether I'm crazy or not. Please
What I'm about to say might weary your weak heart. Please
What I have to say will remain between you and me.
But what you'll do after hearing that...

text: Obanın yakınlarında öldürülen yaşlı kadıncağızı hatırlar mısın?
english: Do you remember the old woman who was killed near the village?

text: O kadını Aytolun öldürdü Korkut dayı.
english: Aytolun killed that woman, Uncle Korkut.
(Selcan) Do you know why? To tell me what she knew

text: Kadın Aytolun'la ilgili bildiklerini bana anlatmak için...

english: took my mother's most precious necklace from me.
Then she told me that Aytolun...

text: ...Duru yengem ölmeden senin oynaşın olduğunu anlattı.
english: ...was your lover before my aunt Duru died .
He was going to tell me more.
(Selcan) I went to the tent to give them what they wanted.
(Selcan) When I returned, the woman was dead.

text: Kadının bana söyleyecekleri neydi bilir misin?
english: Do you know what the woman was going to tell me?
To become the lady of the yurt, Aytolun...
I told you to get lost!

text: Kolyem senin otağındadır. Aytolun saklar onu.
english: My necklace is in your tent. Aytolun hides it. So that
if I speak, they can pin the blame on me.
Goncagül is going to be your husband's wife...
...you're so jealous you don't even know what you're saying.

text: Kolyem aha da bu büyük sandığın içindedir.
english: My necklace is right here, inside this big box.

text: Eğer bir kelam daha edersen seni öldürürüm.
english: If you utter another word, I will kill you.
If you don't resolve this matter...
...you are the other murderer of my aunt Duru, Uncle Korkut. Just so you

(Hep bir ağızdan) Çok yaşa Gümüştekin Bey'im.

text: ...Gündoğdu Bey'imizin sizi daha çok çalıştırması gerekiyor.
english: Mr. Gündoğdu needs to make you work harder.
n't that right, Mr. Ertuğrul? You're absolutely right,

text: Ben de ne kadar zamandır senin gibi usta bir Alp'le talim yapmak isterdim.
english: I've also been wanting to train with a skilled Alpine warrior like you for a long time. Is that
The permission is yours, Ertuğrul Bey.

text: Bu işin içinde bir iş var.
english: something fishy going on here. If

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im talim dediyse belli ki terbiye etmek ister adamı.
english: Ertuğrul Bey mentions training, it's clear he wants to discipline the man.

text: Kardeş, bu meymenetsiz herifin terbiye vakti gelmiştir zaten.
english: Brother, it's high time this unpleasant fellow was taught a lesson .
Let's see what our gentleman's problem is.

text: Nihayet talim için doğru Alpi buldum.
english: Finally, I found the right Alp for training.

text: İnşallah otağımızı yakıp kavuran ihaneti de...
english: God willing, you too will find the traitor who burned and destroyed our tent...
What do you want to say, Ertuğrul Bey? "That's the

text: Anamın otağından çalınan mührü derim Gümüştekin Bey'im.
english: seal stolen from my mother's tent, Mr. Gümüştekin," I say.

text: Bu öyle bir ihanettir ki bir ucu Moğol'a bir ucu da Konya'ya kadar uzar.
english: This is such a betrayal that its ramifications stretch from the Mongols to Konya.

text: Belli ki dilinin altında olup da söyleyemediğin...

english: are some things you're keeping quiet about, Ertuğrul Bey.
